Reviews.Title: “Not the luxury they portray, but passable.”
Reviews.Author: Michael C
Reviews.Content: creative photography makes suites appear posh reality little luxury spartan clean heating shortage hot water showers zero view thats torre near youre expecting view onto st marks disappointed bit service found annoying provide iron ironing board send laundered suits shirts pressed nd couldnt help

Reviews.Title: “very nice, best location”
Reviews.Author: Luigi_Visit
Reviews.Content: lines hotel heart town location venice times complaining size condition usually perfect shape staff nice

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Location for Venice and at a great great price !”

Reviews.Content: youre looking hotel located amazingly located expensive youve found torre suites offers suites located yards amazing piazza san marco youll able enjoy venice offer suites appointed comfortable quiet 78pm ish front desk closes wont able enter hotel door closed hotel street doormen front door ive seen major issue thank god 1015 mn ringing bell finally night guard door couple sleeping kids street waiting believe management

Reviews.Title: “Didn't plan to stay here but really enjoyed it”
Reviews.Author: sooziedaisy
Reviews.Content: found ourselves staying volcanic ash april en route australia glasgow arrangements leaving brisbane sisterinlaw booked apartment train milan venice pleasantly surprised bit difficult reviewer worth lovely decorated traditional italian style comfortable plan kitchen didnt fine preparing meal breakfast adjoining hotel bit trek stairs breakfast situated st marks square location ideal trips enjoyed time werent supposed
